ChestBBInclineShoulderRaise.name: Barbell Incline Shoulder Raise
ChestBBInclineShoulderRaise.preparation: Lie supine on incline bench. Dismount barbell from rack with shoulder width overhand grip. Position barbell over upper chest with elbows extended.
ChestBBInclineShoulderRaise.execution: Raise shoulders toward bar as high as possible. Lower shoulders to bench and repeat.
ChestBBInclineShoulderRaise.comments: Keep arms straight throughout execution. For convenience, exercise can be performed immediately after warm up on Barbell Incline Chest Press.
